articles.title: CPRC Chairman Clarifies Stand of DPRK upon Authorization of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
CPRC Chairman Clarifies Stand of DPRK upon Authorization of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Upon authorization of Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the State and the army, the chairman of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country (CPRC) of the DPRK made public the following stand of the DPRK on Jan. 3 in response to the south Korean Chongwadae's official stand toward our proposed dispatch of our delegation to the Phyongchang Olympic Games and remarks made by President Mun Jae In at the state council meeting:
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, upon receiving a report that the south Korean Chongwadae officially supported and welcomed his stand toward the participation in the Phyongchang Olympic Games and the issue of the improvement of the north-south relations he clarified at the 2018 New Year Address and that at the first state council meeting on Jan. 2 President Mun Jae In personally expressed active support and instructed the relevant fields to take substantial measures, gave an affirmative and high estimation of it and expressed his welcome to such response.
					
					 He instructed the United Front Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country, the National Sports Guidance Committee and relevant units of the DPRK government to promptly take substantial measures with the south Korean authorities out of sincere stand and honest attitude, as the dispatch of our side's delegation to the Phyongchang Olympiad and the talks between the north-south authorities for it which he proposed at the New Year Address are the first meaningful and good step for improved north-south relations under the present situation.
					
					 He also instructed to open the Panmunjom liaison channel between the north and the south from 15:00 on Jan. 3 so that the issues related to the opening of talks including the dispatch of the delegation to Phyongchang Olympic Games would be timely communicated to the south side.
					
					 Whether the issue of improved north-south relations that has been put high on the agenda is settled to comply with the expectation and desire of the whole nation or not entirely depends on how the north and south authorities handle this issue in a responsible manner, he stressed.
					
					 We will try to keep close communications with the south Korean side from sincere stand and honest attitude, true to the intention of our supreme leadership, and deal with the practical matters related to the dispatch of our delegation. We once again sincerely hope that the Phyongchang Olympic Games would successfully open.

articles.title: DPRK Working Class Encouraged by New Year Address
articles.content:
DPRK Working Class Encouraged by New Year Address
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called upon the entire DPRK people to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country this year.
					 The New Year address is inspiring all the DPRK servicepersons and civilians with the pride and self-esteem of being victors and the confidence and optimism.
					
					 Jon Kwang Jun, department director of the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 The New Year Address serves as a militant banner that all the servicepersons and civilians should hold aloft this year marking the 70th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Last year, we had made a series of great achievements, displaying the powerful stamina of heroic Korea under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea. In the period, we came to deeply cherish in our minds the absolute truth that the cause of building a socialist power and the final victory of Juche revolution would be surely brought about as long as we are led by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will strive to increase the power production, further consolidating the achievements made in the field of electric power last year.
					
					 We will also direct big efforts to developing new power sources, put power generation at the existing medium and small-sized power stations on a normal footing, scrupulously organize alternated production throughout the country and wage a vigorous struggle against the practices of wasting electric power.
					
					 Kim Hwang Ho, department director of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, said:
					
					 Upon receiving the New Year address, workers in the field of metallurgical industry are in high spirits.
					
					 Last year, many metallurgical industrial establishments have made great achievements in putting their production processes on a Juche and modern basis with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 This year, we will continue to push forward the project for putting metallurgical industry on a Juche and modern basis and definitely boost the production of iron and steel.

articles.title: S. Korea: Punishment of Those Involved in Shutdown of Kaesong Industrial Park Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Punishment of Those Involved in Shutdown of Kaesong Industrial Park Urged
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Voice of People, the emergency measure committee of south Korea for the Kaesong Industrial Park called a news conference in Seoul on Dec. 29 last year in demand of the punishment of those who shut down the park.
					 The committee deplored that the shutdown of the park was decided on the arbitrary instruction of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 It urged the "government" to make an official apology to the people for having shut down the park unconstitutionally and illegally.
					
					 The organization demanded that the operation in the park be resumed on the principle of restoring to the original state and Kim Kwan Jin, Hong Yong Pyo and all other involved in its shutdown be punished.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "On the Basic Tasks Facing Kim Il Sung University in the New Era of the Juche Revolution" was brought out in booklet at the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia.
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Dec. 22 last year.

articles.title: Nordic Political Parties, Bodies Meet to Celebrate DPRK's Events
articles.content:
Nordic Political Parties, Bodies Meet to Celebrate DPRK's Events
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Nordic progressive political parties and friendly organizations took place in Stockholm of Sweden on Dec. 23 last year to celebrate the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of KPA supreme commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display at its venue was an art work depicting President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and photos showing their revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 There were also books and photos introducing the shining achievements made by the Korean people in building a powerful socialist country under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages and members of progressive political parties, Juche Idea study organizations and associations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in Nordic countries, including the Communist Party in Sweden, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and the Finland-Korea Society, and the ambassador and officials of the DPRK embassy in Sweden.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the art work depicting the great leaders of the DPRK and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 The DPRK is standing firm against the unprecedented pressure and sanctions of the U.S. imperialists by increasing its political and military might in every way.
					
					 The struggle of the Korean people to build a powerful socialist country under the leadership of respected Comrade Kim Jong Un are greatly encouraging the world progressive people.
					
					 The friends of the DPRK are glad to see the successes being registered by the Korean people, and extend full support and solidarity to them.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
